segments.text: The Johnson are on their way back.You remember them , don't you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We met them in Bermuda last May .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The couple with the dogs , think back .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I don't recall a thing about them .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I've invited them for brunch .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hmm , I must be getting absent-minded .
segments.speaker: S2
